home.title: Architecture, closer to you
home.subtitle: Discover nearby architecture and share with everyone

find.title: Find architecture
find.description: Search for buildings by keyword or criteria. Find the ones that interest you.

map.title: Find from map
map.description: Pick an area on the map and discover architecture nearby. Plan your walking route.

survey.title: Survey
survey.description: Answer a short survey and get personalized architecture recommendations.

nearby.title: Architecture nearby
nearby.description: See a list of buildings near your current location. Explore on the go.

exploration.title: Everyone's architecture exploration
exploration.description: Browse visits and posts from other users. You might find something new.
